title: Syllabus mentioned in ERP
text: Prerequisite: Fluid MechanicsGoverning equation of Fluid Dynamics, conservation form, simple CFD techniques, Lax-Wendroff technique, Mac Cormack s techniques, finite volume method, application to Euler equations, upwind difference scheme, viscous flow solutions, staggered grid, SIMPLE Algorithm, SOLA Algorithm, boundary element method and application to potential flows.
